result.eng: I saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.orig: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.html: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í agus í ag teaċt ċugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.

result.eng: He sent the ball across the park.
result.ga: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirce
result.orig: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirce
result.html: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirceHe sent the ball across the park.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeol sé an liaṫróid trasna na páirceHe sent the ball across the park.

result.html: Shiúil sí trasna an bhóthairShe walked across the road.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil sí trasna an ḃóṫairShe walked across the road.

result.eng: Come to me across the room.
result.html: Tar chugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.
result.ponchtml: Tar ċugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.
